DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety tolerability high Single Ascending Oral Doses AZD1656 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics After High Single Ascending Oral Doses AZD1656 T2DM Patients
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure . Male , T2DM patient age 2060 year Treatment 1 2 OADs Therapy T2DM least 30 day prior enrollment Patients treat glitazones within 6 month prior enrollment Male T2DM patient without know cardiovascular disease , exception Grade 1 hypertension without secondary organ involvement ( eg . grade 1 HT allow eye , kidney disease LVH document ) . History ischemic heart disease , heart failure , stroke , transitory ischemic attack peripheral vascular disease . Prolonged QTcF > 450 msec shorten QTcF < 350 msec family history long QT syndrome . Any clinically important abnormality rhythm , conduction morphology rest ECG may interfere interpretation QTc interval change . Systolic BP > 159 mmHg diastolic BP > 99 mmHg screening Day1
